name: Keyara, the obscurus
description:
The page is in work, Weblg will be fixed soon

To move : ← ↑ →

Or : A  D  SPACE

Tips  : You can double jump and it reload every-time you touch the ground!

♬♪♫~ What am I? I don't know.. I'm just trying to find my path..

♫♫♪~ Keyara?  Yeah, it's my name but it doesn't matter since I'm alone..

♬♪♫~ Obscurus? Haha strange name, maybe I'll know one day what does it mean..

🎶 Music is a real part of the game! Make sure to have headphone on! 🎶
